ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,1,6754965324,Data Self - Portrait,Flora Carmen,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/data-self-portrait/id6754965324?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to ""see"" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.",2025-11-07T08:00:00Z,2025-11-07T09:38:38Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,2,1486334843,Raiffeisen Mobile Banking,Raiffeisen bank dd Bosna i Hercegovina,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/raiffeisen-mobile-banking/id1486334843?uo=4,0.0,4.81789,6139,Finance,"What is Raiffeisen Mobile Banking (RMB)?

Raiffeisen Mobile Banking is an application designed to facilitate users' transactions with the Bank. Through the application, you can access your accounts, manage them, make payments, and perform other services. In addition to basic services, you can manage your cards, communicate with the Bank, view current offers, manage your Raiffeisen Invest portfolio, and much more.
Main Features of Raiffeisen Mobile Banking (RMB):

column2: Overview of accounts with a detailed display of transactions
Review transaction details, expenses, and spending habits
Confirmation of completed transactions
Overview of credit card installments
Transactions between own accounts and accounts of individuals and legal entities in Raiffeisen Bank
Transactions to accounts of individuals and legal entities in other banks in BiH
Transactions to accounts abroad
Quick payment ""Pay to contact""
Public revenue payments
Review and cancellation of orders
Ability to save and view samples for payment
Checking balances and payments into Raiffeisen Invest funds
Activation and deactivation of standing orders
One-click card blocking and unblocking
Use biometric authentication for secure access
Hide account details on your dashboard for discretion
Online application for Bank products
Communication with the Bank via RAIA Virtual Assistant
Locate ATMs and branches with geographical positioning
Currency converter
Savings or loan calculator
Exchange rate list

column1: Benefits of RMB - Raiffeisen Mobile Banking:

column2: Guaranteed confidentiality with state-of-the-art security technology, including PIN and biometric login
24/7 account access, independent of branch hours
Save money with favorable payment fees
Save time by avoiding queues

column1: Is it safe to use RMB - Raiffeisen Mobile Banking?

Raiffeisen Mobile Banking uses the latest protection and security technologies. Access to the Raiffeisen Mobile Banking application is secured by biometrics or a unique PIN that you generate during the first login, ensuring the protection and privacy of financial transactions. Additional security is provided by a software token that is automatically installed on the mobile device along with the application. To protect your accounts, the application automatically logs out after a short period of inactivity.",2020-04-13T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T21:17:47Z
ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,3,1011241697,m-ba,UniCredit Bank d.d.,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/m-ba/id1011241697?uo=4,0.0,4.83547,8643,Finance,"BH:
Sa mobilnim bankarstvom (m-ba) upravljajte svojim računima kada god poželite.
m-ba je brza, jednostavna i praktična usluga UniCredit Bank d.d. Mostar koja Vam omogućava potpuni nadzor nad vlastitim novcem:
-       Pregled stanja i prometa svih Vaših računa i računa po kojima ste opunomoćeni
-       Plaćanje režija i drugih računa
-       Mogućnost slanja naloga ino platnog prometa
-       Ugovaranje trajnih naloga
-       Prijenos sredstava između Vaših računa
-       Pregled troškova i limita po karticama
-       Podjela transakcija na rate nastalih kreditnim karticama
-       Upravljanje sigurnosnim dnevnim limitima
-       Apple Pay – beskontaktno plaćanje telefonom na POS terminalima
-       Aktiviranje novih i reizdanih kartica
-       3DS autorizacija web kartičnih transakcija putem m-ba ili m-token aplikacije
-       Pregled PIN koda za debitne i kreditne kartice
-       Ugovaranje i plaćanje e-uplatnica
-       Dokumenti u m-ba
-       Prijava u aplikaciju pomoću biometrije
-       Upravljanje budžetom i troškovima
-       Brza provjera računa bez prijave u m-ba
-       Pregled kontakata u Banci...
m-token je aplikacija koja služi za identifikaciju korisnika i potvrdu izvršavanja transakcija putem usluge Internet bankarstvo (e-ba).
m-ba i m-token aplikaciju možete ugovoriti u najbližoj poslovnici UniCredit Bank d.d. Mostar.
EN:
Mobile banking (m-ba app) enables you to manage your accounts wherever you want.
m-ba is simple, fast and user-friendly mobile service of UniCredit Bank d.d. Mostar, which provides you with the full oversight of your personal finances:
-       Checking account balances and list of transactions for all your accounts, including accounts which you are authorised to operate
-       Payment of utility bills and other invoices
-       Foreign exchange within your accounts
-       International payments processing
-       Standing orders contracting
-       Credit card installments
-       Card limits management
-       Apple Pay – contactless payment by phone at POS terminals
-       Card activation
-       3DS authorize card transactions with m-ba or m-token app
-       Card PIN view
-       Set-up and payment of e-bills
-       Documents in m-ba
-       Application login with biometrics authentication
-       Personal finance manager
-       Fast check account balance using widget option
-       Bank contact details…
m-token is an application which serves for client identification and transaction verification via Internet banking (e-ba).
Apply for m-ba and m-token services at all UniCredit Bank d.d. Mostar branches.",2020-04-13T07:00:00Z,2025-10-15T09:19:08Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,4,932493382,Revolut - Mobile Finance,Revolut Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/revolut-mobile-finance/id932493382?uo=4,0.0,4.79221,77,Finance,"Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.
This description is relevant for UK residents only.
Make your spend, well-spent
- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way
Send money near, far, wherever they are
- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension
Save the interest-ing way
- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying
Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)
- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend
- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).
Unlock security features that you control
- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money
How we protect your money
- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.",2020-04-10T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T16:41:08Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,5,1509897528,NLB Pay,NLB d.d.,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/nlb-pay/id1509897528?uo=4,0.0,4.32787,61,Finance,"ENG: NLB Pay is a mobile wallet app that facilitates secure, quick, and contactless payments. It allows financial management, card security options, transaction tracking, and making payments from your smartphone. The app features Flik instant payments for immediate money transfer using phone numbers or email addresses, and QR code payments in stores. It integrates seamlessly with Apple Wallet for NLB cards and provides instant transaction updates via push notifications.

SLO: NLB Pay je mobilna denarnica, ki omogoča varna, hitra in brezstična plačila s pametnimi telefoni in napravami. Omogoča tudi dvigovanje gotovine na brezstičnih bančnih avtomatih, varnostno upravljanje kartic in sledenje transakcijam. Aplikacija vključuje Flik takojšnja plačila za takojšnji prenos denarja s pomočjo telefonskih številk ali e-poštnih naslovov ter plačila s QR kodo v trgovinah. Brezhibno se integrira z Apple Walletom za NLB kartice in omogoča takojšnje obveščanje o transakcijah preko potisnih sporočil.

Uporabniki lahko povežejo račune NLB bank, trenutno podprto za banki NLB Slovenija in NLB Črna Gora. NLB kartice je sedaj mogoče dodati neposredno v Apple Wallet prek aplikacije.",2020-06-10T07:00:00Z,2025-10-06T10:33:36Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,6,1436799971,Binance: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto,Binance Switzerland AG,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/binance-buy-bitcoin-crypto/id1436799971?uo=4,0.0,4.79478,536,Finance,"Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.
Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong.
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority (""FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).
Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.
*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges
Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:
- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.

- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.",2020-04-11T07:00:00Z,2025-11-18T12:27:30Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,7,6741476987,Moja Vienna,Vienna osiguranje d.d,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/moja-vienna/id6741476987?uo=4,0.0,5,6,Finance,"Treba ti osiguranje, ali nikako da nađeš vremena da ga ugovoriš? Dogodila ti se nezgoda, ne znaš gdje ti je polica niti šta treba od dokumentacije za prijavu osiguranog slučaja? Želiš obavljati zdravstvene preglede, vježbati u fitness centrima te kupovati u prodavnicama  sportske opreme, zdrave hrane i sl. uz popuste?

Odlično, na pravom si mjestu! Moja Vienna je prva mobilna aplikacija za osiguranja u BiH koja ti omogućava brz i jednostavan uvid u police osiguranja, prijavu osiguranih slučajeva, uplatu premija, kupovinu osiguranje i sl., a sve uz popuste i vrijedne nagrade Vienna programa lojalnosti.
Moja Vienna je pažljivo dizajnirana i jednostavna za korištenje, u potpunosti je usklađena sa zahtjevima sigurnosti i zaštite ličnih podataka, kao i sa ciljevima održivog poslovanja.
POTPUNO BESPLATNO, nudi brojne pogodnosti, u bilo koje vrijeme i sa bilo koje lokacije.
Sva dokumentacija i informacije na jednom mjestu, u realnom vremenu

• Uz Moja Vienna nećeš kopati po papirima, pretraživati arhivu i web stranice, sve police osiguranja, potrebne informacije o isteku ugovora, rizicima u pokriću, premiji, osiguranoj sumi i dr. su sada na jednom mjestu i prikazani u realnom vremenu, uključivo statuse svih svojih zahtjeva po ugovoru o osiguranju (osigurani slučaj, promjena na ugovoru i sl.).
Kupovina osiguranja uz posebne popuste i uz automatiziran unos podataka
• Samo jednom unosiš podatke o osiguranicima za koje ugovaraš osiguranje, nakon čega taj proces biva automatiziran za svaku narednu kupovinu, a koju ostvaruješ uz dodatne popuste i uštede.
U par klikova promijeni ugovor, zakaži pregled, prijavi osigurani slučaj, plati premiju...

• Bez ikakve naknade, zatraži promjenu iznosa premije, trajanja osiguranja i sl., ili plati premiju osiguranja. Zakazivanje pregleda dobrovoljnog zdravstvenog osiguranja i prijava osiguranog slučaja u samo nekoliko klikova.
Uvijek dostupna kućna i medicinska asistencija

• Direktno iz aplikacije pozovi dežurne telefone 24/7 i zatražite asistencije na koje ostvaruješ pravo po svom ugovoru o osiguranju – Vienna zdravstveni centar, Kućna medicinska pomoć, Majstor u kući, Medicinska pomoć u inostranstvu...
Program lojalnosti

• Digitalna kartica i Vienna Program lojalnosti omogućava do 20% popusta (u zavisnosti od nivoa lojalnosti) u više od 70 zdravstvenih ustanova, prodavnica sportske opreme, hotela i fitness centara širom BiH. Aktivnim korištenjem aplikacije popusti i uštede se povećavaju, uz dodatne podgodnosti i vrijedne nagrade.",2025-11-04T08:00:00Z,2025-11-18T19:58:55Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,8,6469105269,NLB mKlik novi,NLB Banka a.d. Banja Luka,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/nlb-mklik-novi/id6469105269?uo=4,0.0,2.67568,37,Finance,"NLB mKlik je mobilna aplikacija NLB banke a.d. Banja Luka koja omogućava jednostavno i sigurno obavljanje finansijskih transakcija putem mobilnog telefona.
Mobilno bankarstvo može da koristi fizičko i pravno lice koje ima otvoren račun u Banci i posjeduje mobilni telefon koji ima pristup internetu.
NLB mKlik Vam omogućava:

column2: uvid u stanje i promjene na računima u Banci
ispostavljanje naloga u domaćem i deviznom platnom prometu
obavljanje transakcija između vlastitih računa
pregled i štampu izvoda
mogućnost kreiranja šablona za plaćanje
prijem i plaćanje elektronskih faktura
kontrolu mogućnosti korištenja kartice za plaćanje putem interneta
blokiranje platnih kartica
reaktivaciju aplikacije
lokator ekpozitura i bankomata
konverziju valuta i još mnogo toga.

column1: Prednosti  NLB mKlik-a:

column2: Povoljnije naknade za realizaciju transakcija
Jednostavno i sigurno upravljanje finansijama, bilo kada i bilo gdje
Ušteda vremena , jer možete obavljati bankarske usluge nezavisno od radnog vremena poslovnice

column1: Aktivacija NLB mKlik-a:

column2: Nakon ugovoranja NLB mKlik je odmah spreman za instaliranje i korištenje na vašem mobilnom telefonu. Putem mail-a primićete link za download aplikacije kao i aktivacioni kod. Aplikaciju možete pokrenuti unosom aktivacionog koda, nakon čega definišete PIN i kod za obnovu.

column1: Reaktivacija aplikacije:

column2: Registrovani nalog NLB mKlik možete reaktivirati iz same aplikacije. Klikom na opciju „Novi korisnik“ (na stranici za prijavljivanje) i unošenjem e-mail adrese registrovane za korišćenje usluge mobilnog bankarstva zajedno sa kodom za obnovu",2024-02-27T08:00:00Z,2025-04-22T06:57:59Z

column1: ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,9,6742830297,mBBI,BBI d.d. Sarajevo,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/mbbi/id6742830297?uo=4,0.0,3.80769,26,Finance,"The mBBI application is a mobile banking service from BBI Bank that enables users to perform banking transactions and business with the bank quickly, safely, and easily. In addition to saving time and money, users can access the service 24/7 without needing to visit bank branches.

With the mBBI application, users can control the balance and transactions on their accounts, check the execution of payment orders, pay all types of bills within the domestic payment system, buy and sell foreign currency, and perform a number of other customer services—all without physically coming to the bank!
Main functionalities of mBBI:
All accounts:
Current Account (overview of balance, turnover, transaction history)

column2: Overview of balance and account details
Overview of the status and details of the agreed package of products and services of the bank
Overview of traffic by account
Carrying out transactions between own accounts and the accounts of PI (private individuals) and legal entities in BBI Bank
Carrying out transactions on the accounts of PI (private individuals) and legal entities in other banks in Bosnia and Herzegovina
Carrying out transactions through the telephone directory for BBI Bank clients
Payments of public revenues
Payment of monthly utility bills with the eRežija service, with the largest number of contracted partners
Exchange rate
Creation of a standing order
Sending proof of payment directly from the application
Downloading electronic statements
Quick payments based on created samples
Overview and security management of cards
Creation of internal orders

column1: Savings (overview of balance and turnover)
Financing (overview of balance and turnover)
Credit Cards (overview of balance and transactions)
Useful Information and Other Services:

column2: New look of the application – improved graphic/visual design and performance
Ability to hide account details on the home screen
Useful tools and information for all application users upon entering the application (exchange rate list, FAQ, contacts, etc.)
Biometric authentication/Using the application with the highest level of security/login to the application via PIN or biometrics
Limit adjustment according to consumption channels
Geographic display of branches and locations of BBI Bank ATMs, as well as ATMs of members of the BH Network, with simple locating of the nearest ATM
News, offers, and special actions
Overview of the exchange rate list and currency calculator
Contacts

column1: Advantages of using the new mBBI application of BBI Bank:

column2: Availability 24 hours a day, regardless of the Bank's working hours
Use the service wherever Internet access is available
Save money with more favorable fees for order execution
Save time by avoiding waiting in lines at the Bank counter

column1: Prerequisites for service:

column2: Opened current account in Bosna Bank International d.d.
Mobile device - smartphone
Access to the Internet on a mobile device

column1: For any additional questions regarding the mBBI mobile banking service, visit the nearest BBI branch, call the BBI contact center via the free info number 080 020 020, or email: info@bbi.ba.",2025-07-22T07:00:00Z,2025-09-12T10:45:22Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,10,1544923219,Smart Nova,NOVA BANKA a.d. Banja Luka,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/smart-nova/id1544923219?uo=4,0.0,2.95,20,Finance,"SMART NOVA omogućuje upravljanje vlastitim finansijama gdje god da se nalazite.
Nova banka Vam, kroz uslugu SMART NOVA, omogućuje da sami kontrolišete stanje i promet na svojim računima, vršite plaćanja kao i brojne druge pogodnosti.

Pored standardnih bankarskih usluga kao što su interni transferi, standardna i devizna plaćanja, pregledi po karticama i računima, trajni nalozi, kreiranje šablona, sa ovim digitalnim rješenjem biće Vam omogućene i neke nove funkcionalnosti kao što su:
- mjenjačnica koja će omogućiti mjenjač za sve valute koje se nalaze na kursnoj listi Banke;
- direktna komunikacija sa Bankom putem virtual inboxa;
- push poruke i notifikacije;
- locirajte najbližih poslovnica ili bankomata Banke;
- katalog proizvoda uz mogućnost apliciranja za neki od proizvoda Banke.
Banka radi na razvoju novih SMART NOVA funkcionalnosti koje će uskoro biti omogućene korisnicima usluge, a koje se odnose na:
- isplata novca na bankomatima bez korišćenja platne kartice,
- slanje novca na adresu klijenta kroz P2P plaćanje;
- devizno plaćanje kroz EuroGiro platni sistem plaćanja koji će u znatnoj mjeri pojeftiniti naknade za devizna plaćanja u inostranstvo;",2020-12-30T08:00:00Z,2025-04-02T07:36:50Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,11,731342709,SIMPL mBanking,Sparkasse Bank dd BiH,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/simpl-mbanking/id731342709?uo=4,0.0,2.59574,47,Finance,"SIMPL mBanking aplikacija na vašem mobilnom uređaju omogućava vam da koristite bankarske usluge i vršite finansijske transakcije putem mobilnog uređaja. Ovo je siguran, brz, jednostavan i isplativ način finansijskog poslovanja koji vam je dostupan 24h dnevno.
Uz SIMPL mBanking uslugu naše banke možete jednostavno:

column2: plaćati režije i druge vrste računa,
plaćati kroz opciju Slikaj&Plati, jednostavnim fotografisanjem računa
ugovoriti putno zdravstveno ili osiguranje od nezgode
koristiti uslugu “Brzica” za brzi prenos novca kontaktima iz svog imenika koji imaju račun i registriran broj mobitela u našoj banci
izvršavati prenose sredstava na račune drugih fizičkih i pravnih lica
vršiti prenos sredstava između vlastitih računa
obavljati konverziju valuta,
Izvršiti blokadu ili deblokadu vaše kartice, te upravljati dozvoljenim mjestima trošenja ( Internet, POS, ATM)
vršiti pregled stanja, prometa i obaveza po svim računima i karticama,
vršiti različita podešavanja aplikacije, promjene PINa, postavke biometrije, fonta, jezika i slično.

column1: SIMPL mBanking usluga vam pruža informacije i o :

column2: korisnim kontaktima u Banci,
kursnoj/tečajnoj listi,
radnom vremenu/lokaciji poslovnica i bankomata,
proizvodima Banke.

column1: Sparkasse Bank najveći naglasak stavlja na sigurnost, te vam pored mogućnosti prijave putem lozinke, stoji na raspolaganju i prijava biometrijom (face recognition i finger print). Ovaj način prijave se može odabrati prilikom prve prijave na aplikaciju ili kroz postavke unutar aplikacije.",2020-04-15T07:00:00Z,2025-08-11T09:34:12Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,12,6470025685,NLB mBank Sarajevo,NLB Banka d.d. Sarajevo,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/nlb-mbank-sarajevo/id6470025685?uo=4,0.0,4.7619,21,Finance,"Novo mobilno bankarstvo! Preuzmite i isprobajte NLB mBank.
Udobno, brzo i sigurno mobilno bankarstvo. Uz NLB mBank iz svoga doma, kancelarije ili bilo kog drugog mjesta, Banka Vam je dostupna 24h na dan.
Korištenjem mobilne apilkacije možete obaviti transakcije bez dolaska u Banku a uštediti ćete vrijeme i novac uz najviši stepen sigurnosti..
Šta je novo! Glavne funkcionalnosti novog NLB mBank su:
Glavne funkcionalnosti NLB mBank:
- Pregled stanja i detalja računa
- Pregled prometa po računima
- Obavljanje transakcija između vlastitih računa i računa fizičkih i pravnih lica u NLB Banci
- Obavljanje transakcija na račune fizičkih i pravnih lica u drugim bankama u BiH
- Obavljanje transakcija putem telefonskog imenika za klijente NLB Banke
- Uplate javnih prihoda
- Plaćanje režijskih računa
- Mjenjačnica
- Kreiranje trajnog naloga
- Slanje dokaza o plaćanju direktno iz aplikacije
- Preuzimanje izvoda
- Pregled i sigurnosno upravljanje karticama
- Podešavanje limita prema kanalima potrošnje
- Novi izgled aplikacije
- Biometrijska autentikacija
- Reaktivacija aplikacije bez kontaktiranja Banke
- Mogućnost sakrivanja detalja računa na početnom ekranu
- Korisni alati i informacije za sve korisnike aplikacije pri samom ulasku u aplikaciju
(kursna lista, FAQ, kontakti)
- Geografski prikaz lokacija bankomata i poslovnica NLB Banke
New mobile banking! Download and try NLB mBank.
Comfortable, fast and secure mobile banking. With NLB mBank from your home, office or any other place, the Bank is available to you 24 hours a day.
By using the mobile application, you can make transactions without coming to the Bank, and you will save time and money with the highest level of security.
What is new! Main functionalities of new NLB mBank:
Main functionalities of NLB mBank:
- Overview of account balance and details
- Overview of traffic by account
- Carrying out transactions between own accounts and the accounts of natural and legal persons in NLB Bank
- Carrying out transactions on the accounts of natural and legal persons in other banks in Bosnia and Herzegovina
- Conducting transactions through the telephone directory for NLB Bank clients
- Payments of public revenues
- Payment of utility bills
- Exchange
- Creating a permanent account
- Sending proof of payment directly from the application
- Extraction download
- Overview and security management of cards
- Limit setting according to consumption channels
- New look of the application
- Biometric authentication
- Application reactivation without contacting the Bank
- Ability to hide account details on home screen
- Useful tools and information for all application users upon entering the application
(course list, FAQ, contacts)
- Geographical display of the locations of NLB Bank ATMs and branches",2024-06-05T07:00:00Z,2025-06-04T13:29:57Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,13,6748067146,MF banka,"""MF banka"" a.d. Banja Luka",https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/mf-banka/id6748067146?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Finance,"MF Bank – MF 2 GO is a modern and secure mobile banking app that gives you full control over your finances anytime, anywhere.
Whether you’re at home, at work, or abroad, MF 2 GO lets you access your accounts, make payments, and manage your money 24/7.
Key features:
24/7 availability – perform banking services at any time
Secure login – biometric authentication (fingerprint), PIN, and scramble keyboard for enhanced security
Domestic and international payments – pay bills and transfer money in local and foreign currencies
Statements and reports – view and download in PDF format
ATM and branch locator – find nearest locations with working hours and contact info
Payment card management – view card transactions and block card if needed
Saved templates and beneficiaries – save time on frequent payments
Virtual inbox – receive/send messages from the bank
Selfcare options – set preferred account, enable biometrics, and manage app preferences
Corporate access – available for business clients as well

MF 2 GO is designed for users who expect speed, flexibility, and security in digital banking. Your data is protected with advanced encryption and secure access protocols.   ",2025-07-18T07:00:00Z,2025-11-19T12:11:45Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,14,413251709,MetaTrader 5,MetaQuotes Software Corp.,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/metatrader-5/id413251709?uo=4,0.0,4.91729,133,Finance,"Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.
TRADING
• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history
ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY
• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services
TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line
Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.",2020-04-17T07:00:00Z,2025-11-10T22:58:44Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,15,1205990992,TradingView: Track All Markets,"TradingView, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/tradingview-track-all-markets/id1205990992?uo=4,0.0,4.81914,94,Finance,"In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set:
World-leading charts

A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.
Simple Pine Script for complex tools

From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.
Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.
Unmissable alerts
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.
Made to trade
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.
One app to track them all

Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.
Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.
Watchlist what matters

Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be.
Data. Data. Data,

Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.
Never trade alone again

Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.
Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/",2020-04-12T07:00:00Z,2025-11-18T06:23:37Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,16,6745598669,Raiffeisen BiH,Raiffeisen bank dd Bosna i Hercegovina,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/raiffeisen-bih/id6745598669?uo=4,0.0,5,1,Finance,"What is Raiffeisen RMB LE?

The mobile token is a mobile application used in online banking instead of a physical token to enhance the security and convenience of account access and transaction authorization. Designed for businesses, the mobile token is integrated into a smartphone app, eliminating the need for physical devices.
Key Features:
Secure Login: The mobile token generates a one-time password (OTP) to ensure that only authorized users can access the account.
Transaction Authorization: For payment confirmation, the mobile token provides an additional layer of security by generating unique codes.
Convenience: As part of a mobile app, users can manage their banking activities with the help  of the mobile token anywhere and anytime without the need for extra devices.
Benefits:
Enhanced Security: Reduces the risk of fraud by requiring multi-factor authentication.
User-Friendly: Simplifies the process of logging in and approving transactions.
Cost-Effective: Eliminates the need for physical security devices, reducing costs for banks and users.
The mobile token offers a robust solution for online banking, providing businesses with security in managing their finances online.",2025-06-12T07:00:00Z,2025-06-12T16:51:39Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,17,612261027,Wise - Global Money,Wise Payments Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/wise-global-money/id612261027?uo=4,0.0,4.96124,129,Finance,"16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.
— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics
— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details
— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction
— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts
— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed
— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more
Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)

Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.",2020-04-14T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T23:58:33Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,18,673685582,m – Intesa,INTESA SANPAOLO BANKA d.d. BOSNA I HERCEGOVINA,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/m-intesa/id673685582?uo=4,0.0,2.84,25,Finance,"Uz m-Intesa mobilno bankarstvo jednostavno, sigurno i brzo upravljajte svojim finansijama 24 sata dnevno. Ukoliko želite postati korisnik m-Intesa usluge, aplicirajte putem online zahtjeva na našoj web stranici www.intesasanpaolobanka.ba i otkrijte jednostavnije bankarstvo sa Intesa Sanpaolo Bankom.
Mobilna aplikacija donosi nove i inovativne funkcionalnosti:

column3: Uvid i upravljanje proizvodima koje koristite u Banci
Usluge plaćanja u zemlji i inostranstvu
Slanje obavijest sa potvrdom o odobrenom nalogu na e-mail
Korisni alati i informacije za sve korisnike bez potrebe logiranja u aplikaciju

column1: (kontakti, pregled poslovnica sa radnim vremenom, mreža bankomata, kursna lista, konvertor i demo aplikacija)

column1: Sigurnost prije svega

column3: m-Intesa aplikacija je zaštićena sigurnosnim uređajem u obliku tokena ugrađenog u samoj aplikaciji. Pristup aplikaciji nije moguć bez lozinke koju znate samo Vi;

Nakon tri pogrešna unosa lozinke, aplikacija postaje neaktivna, što je čini sigurnijom;
Moguća biomterijska prijava za bržu i sigurniju prijavu",2020-04-14T07:00:00Z,2025-07-29T19:41:59Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,20,718248239,Skrill - Wallet App,Skrill Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/skrill-wallet-app/id718248239?uo=4,0.0,4.62222,90,Finance,"Make your move and join millions already using Skrill to transfer money quickly and pay online securely – all from one easy-to-use wallet app.
With the Skrill digital wallet you can pay at thousands of websites, send money locally or abroad, and exchange currency. All without relying on your bank.
Plus, you can earn points on your transactions and be rewarded with the Knect loyalty program.
Why make your move with the Skrill wallet app? Here are some of the reasons why our customers choose us.*
SECURE ONLINE PAYMENTS
· Pay effortlessly at sports, gaming, and trading websites. There’s no need to share your bank or card details – all you need is your Skrill login.
· Say goodbye to slow withdrawals. Payouts with Skrill are quick and hassle-free when you’re ready to cash out.
· Choose the payment option that suits you and fund your digital wallet by card, bank transfer, or a local payment option.
· Manage your money on the go with real-time notifications whenever you spend or send money.
THE SKRILL PREPAID MASTERCARD®
· Make your next prepaid card a Skrill Mastercard. Use your card to instantly access your balance online, in stores, or as cash at ATMs.
· Pay securely with a card that’s not linked to your bank account.
· Add your card to Apple Pay® and make contactless payments with your phone.
· Freeze your prepaid card from within the app if it’s lost or stolen.
FAST MONEY TRANSFERS
· Send money at lightning speed to anyone with a Skrill account. All you need is their phone number or email address.
· Transfer money to a bank account overseas at great rates. Set up alerts to be the first to hear when the currency exchange rate hits your preferred amount.
· Request payment from someone who doesn’t have a Skrill account by sending them a link to pay you.
30+ CRYPTOCURRENCIES

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take two minutes to learn more at www.skrill.com/cryptocurrency-risk-statement/.
· Buy an interest in more than 30 cryptocurrencies from your Skrill app, including Bitcoin, Ethereum and Tether.
· Schedule automatic purchases with recurring buys and limit orders.
· Set up crypto price alerts to be notified when the market reaches a certain value.
· Withdraw your funds to crypto by sending them directly to a cryptocurrency address.
LOYALTY REWARDS
· Earn points on your transactions with our loyalty program – Knect. Exchange your points for money in your account.
· Become a VIP Skriller to enjoy lower fees, higher limits, and other benefits.
· Take advantage of exclusive offers from our merchant partners.
SPORTS CORNER
· View advanced statistics, winning tips, and live scores on major sports tournaments.
· Check the probability of events happening based on statistical analysis of historic data.
· Insights available for football, basketball, and American football games.
CURRENCY EXCHANGE
· Easily transact in different currencies. Skrill lets you hold multiple currencies in one account.
· Exchange between more than 40 currencies including the US dollar and euro.
24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
· Enjoy fast and friendly support in your local language.
*Some features are subject to jurisdictional limitations and may be accessible only in select territories.
Skrill’s offering of and support to the Skrill Prepaid Mastercard® Program is limited to residents of the European Economic Area and UK.
Visit www.skrill.com to review the Cryptocurrency Terms of Use and Cryptocurrency Risk Statement.",2020-04-16T07:00:00Z,2025-11-12T11:01:09Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,21,1178612530,Aircash,aircash d.o.o.,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/aircash/id1178612530?uo=4,0.0,4.25713,35,Finance,"Aircash is a multi-currency digital wallet and issuer of the Aircash Mastercard card.

With Aircash, users can top up instantly and easily with cash or any credit/debit card. Withdraw money at any ATM, point of sale of Aircash partners or bank account. Send to friends or family, pay for various services, buy telecom and digital vouchers and top up numerous online accounts.

With Aircash, you have full control over your money – fast, easy, and always available. With the Aircash Wallet and Aircash Prepaid Mastercard, you have worldwide flexibility, whether online, in stores, or at ATMs.
AIRCASH MASTERCARD

Get the Aircash Mastercard at our retail locations or through Amazon and use it at over 30 million locations worldwide. The card is managed directly through your Aircash Wallet – simply load it and get started!
DEPOSIT
Instantly and fee-free, load funds to your Aircash Wallet with cash at more than 200,000 retail locations or with any credit/debit card.
MONEY TRANSFER
Send money to friends and family, no matter where they are. The funds are available in seconds in their Aircash Wallet in their currency.
SERVICES
Buy tickets, pay bills, get vouchers, and top up online accounts – all in one app.
WITHDRAWAL
No problem – use your Aircash Mastercard at ATMs worldwide or withdraw cash from your Aircash Wallet at selected retail locations.
Get the Aircash app now and enjoy all the everyday benefits Aircash has to offer!",2020-04-10T07:00:00Z,2025-11-13T09:19:38Z

ba,Bosnia and Herzegovina,Finance,6015,23,6448475149,Western Union: Self Service,The Western Union Company,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/western-union-self-service/id6448475149?uo=4,0.0,3,2,Finance,"We’ve made it easier for you to manage your Western Union transfers with the Western Union: Self Service app.
If you need to request money from a friend or family member, track a transfer, redirect an incoming transfer to your bank account, or find a nearby Western Union agent location – we have you covered.
Key features:
• Request money from your sender
Do you need extra money? Now you can make money requests from senders in multiple countries whenever you need it. With the Western Union: Self Service app, requesting money has never been easier.
• Track a money transfer
To track your money transfer in real time, enter the tracking number (MTCN) and get the real-time status of your money.
• Redirect transfers
You can redirect any cash transfer to your bank account for fast and secure access to your funds.
• Find a Western Union agent location

Your app can also help you find a nearby Western Union agent location in just a few taps. Remember that our Western Union agent locations are independent businesses providing our money transfer services to our customers.
• Get in touch with us
No matter what questions or concerns you may have, we’re here for you. You can also get in touch by visiting a nearby Western Union agent location.
With the Western Union: Self Service app, you can now change the way you receive money in Morocco and the Philippines!

Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985. See terms and conditions for details. Certain features may not be available to or from all countries and are subject to change. Learn more in the Western Union: Self Service app.

The information transmitted, including any content in this communication, is confidential, intended only for the use of the intended recipient, and is the property of the Western Union Company or its affiliates and subsidiaries. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use of the information contained in or transmitted with this communication, or dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify the Western Union sender immediately by replying to this message and delete the original message.",2023-06-02T07:00:00Z,2025-11-10T17:48:21Z

Banja Luka,https://apps.apple.com/ba/app/lova-pay/id6445817990?uo=4,0.0,4.83486,109,Finance,"Lova is the first application in BiH created with the aim of connecting our users with each other or connecting users with merchants. As a modern and multifunctional platform, in this way Lova enables quick receiving/sending of money, payment/charging of goods and services by simply scanning a QR code, payment in web shops, payments and withdrawals via merchants (kiosk, store, etc.), services such as paying bills without standing in lines and going to the bank, fast loans, paying for parking, certain taxes and many others will soon be available.
